TEXT.BODY: Shr 66 cts vs 48 cts Net 8,413,000 vs 6,112,000 Sales 267.9 mln vs 230.6 mln Nine mths Shr 2.20 dlrs vs 2.05 dlrs Net 28.1 mln 26.4 mln Sales 806.7 mln vs 720.7 mln NOTE: 1986 3rd qtr results include extraordinary loss on extinguishment of debt of 1,482,000 dlrs or 12 cts a shr. Reuter
